Team Section with Profiles.Layout: Grid layout with multiple rows and columns, showcasing individual team member profiles.
Team Section with Profiles.Design: Professional and visually appealing. Each profile includes an image, name, designation, and social media links.

Key Elements.Section Header: A bold, centered title followed by a brief introductory text.
Key Elements.Team Member Profiles: Each profile comprises a rounded image, name in bold, designation, and social media links.
Key Elements.Responsive Design: Grid adjusts for different screen sizes with varying column counts.
Key Elements.Visual Hierarchy: Consistent styling for names and designations for easy readability.

Team Section with Profiles.Use Cases: Ideal for company websites, agency portfolios, and any platform aiming to highlight team members or contributors.
